name: Isabelle has a gun!
description:
Isabelle has a gun.

Tom Nook has taken the town hall hostage and has produced many clones thanks to his science team at Nook Inc. Kill 'em.

To play just use the mouse to shoots and WASD to move.

There is no way to win.

I OWN NONE OF THE ASSETS USED THEY BELONG TO NINTENDO.
